Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Pulaski, Augusta, Kostner, and Chicago due to, street blockage near Chicago/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Pulaski, Augusta, Kostner, and Chicago due to, street blockage near Chicago/Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 131st/Langley
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th and Forestville due to, street blockage near 131st/Langley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th and Forestville due to, street blockage near 131st/Langley.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line trains bypassing Clinton
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Clinton due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Clinton due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
